overview: A 15 minute documentary utilizing archival Super 8 film footage and original animation about a father fulfilling his dream of reconnecting his 5 small children to the steps of his own father when he fought for the Canadian military in WW2 through a trip to Europe in 1973.
tagline: Summer of 1973, A family trip to Europe, A Super 8 movie camera, Let the memories beginâ€¦
title: European Tour '73
